content.question: Gian Lorenzo Bernini’s inclusion of sculptures of the Cornaro family members in the side balconies of the chapel was intended to elicit which of the following audience responses?

choices.label: Identification with their role as witnesses of Saint Teresa’s experience
An understanding that lay people had an equal role in the ministry of the church
Empathy for the family members as well as for their expressions of remorse and regret for past sins
Anger over the reinstatement of a Venetian family that had been ousted from power

content.answer: Identification with their role as witnesses of Saint Teresa’s experience
